description.p: KMLDonkey is an advanced GUI frontend for the MLDonkey peer-to-peer core.

ul.li: Supports most of the P2P protocols handled by the mldonkey backend (eDonkey/eMule, BitTorrent, Gnutella, Gnutella2, DirectConnect, FastTrack, SoulSeek, Audiogalaxy, OpenFT, FileTP)
Supports a lot of configuration options in the mldonkey backend
Can be used with traffic-shaping tools
